release.action: Added initial site documentation, generation of plugin-docs, changes and some development/contribution information.
New coverage report, replacing the old one. Now includes line-coverage with annotated source code listings.
Added several unit and integration tests.
Cover reports working with export_all option. This implies the cover_with_export_all patch proposed for erlang/OTP (git fetch git://github.com/schlagert/otp.git cover_with_export_all).
Fixed and documented automatic application/release version handling to be able to support the maven-release plugin to manage project versioning.
Added possibility to include non-erlang sources into applicatio packages.
Rewritten all mojos from the original maven-erlang plugin.
